Desc: Allows to obtain available commands as well as specific information of a command
It allows to obtain configuration information of the current bot in addition to changing some of its parameters

Args.-L: Change the language of the bot

Desc: This module allows to send messages to the users automatically

Args.-set: Set a message sent to the user or group
Args.-del: Delete a automated message sent to the user or group
Args.-list: List all the automated messages sent to the user or group
Args.-edit: Edit an automated message sent to the user or group

Desc: Search in google and get a screenshot of the result and select the result
